parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per protocol-specified study treatment, constant-dosing interval, per subject

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study.

datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.

datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence Number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: EXSEQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Used to tie together a block of related records in a single domain for a subject.
datasetVariables.label: Group ID
datasetVariables.name: EXGRPID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXREFID

datasetVariables.description: Internal or external identifier (e.g., kit number, bottle label, vial identifier).
datasetVariables.label: Reference ID
datasetVariables.name: EXREFID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXSPID

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined reference number. Perhaps pre-printed on the CRF as an explicit line identifier or defined in the sponsor's operational database. Example: Line number on a CRF Page.
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor-Defined Identifier
datasetVariables.name: EXSPID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXLNKID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to link related records across domains.
datasetVariables.label: Link ID
datasetVariables.name: EXLNKID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXLNKGRP

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to link related, grouped records across domains.
datasetVariables.label: Link Group ID
datasetVariables.name: EXLNKGRP

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXTRT

datasetVariables.description: Name of the protocol-specified study treatment given during the dosing period for the observation.
datasetVariables.label: Name of Treatment
datasetVariables.name: EXTRT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to define a category of EXTRT values.

datasetVariables.name: EXCAT

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXSCAT

datasetVariables.name: EXSCAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXDOSE

datasetVariables.description: Amount of EXTRT when numeric. Not populated when EXDOSTXT is populated.
datasetVariables.label: Dose
datasetVariables.name: EXDOSE

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXDOSTXT

datasetVariables.description: Amount of EXTRT when non-numeric. Dosing amounts or a range of dosing information collected in text form. Example: 200-400. Not populated when EXDOSE is populated.
datasetVariables.label: Dose Description
datasetVariables.name: EXDOSTXT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXDOSU

datasetVariables.description: Units for EXDOSE, EXDOSTOT, or EXDOSTXT representing protocol-specified values. Examples: "ng", "mg", "mg/kg", "mg/m2".

datasetVariables.name: EXDOSU

datasetVariables.description: Dose form for EXTRT. Examples: "TABLET", "LOTION".

datasetVariables.name: EXDOSFRM

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXLOT

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXSTDTC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXENDTC

datasetVariables.description: The date/time when administration of the treatment indicated by EXTRT and EXDOSE ended. For administrations considered given at a point in time (e.g., oral tablet, pre-filled syringe injection), where only an administration date/time is collected, EXSTDTC should be copied to EXENDTC as the standard representation.
datasetVariables.label: End Date/Time of Treatment
datasetVariables.name: EXENDTC

datasetVariables.name: EXENDY

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXDUR

datasetVariables.description: Collected duration of administration. Used only if collected on the CRF and not derived from start and end date/times.
datasetVariables.label: Duration of Treatment
datasetVariables.name: EXDUR

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXTPT

datasetVariables.description:
1. Text Description of time when administration should occur.
2. This may be represented as an elapsed time relative to a fixed reference point, such as time of last dose. See EXTPTNUM and EXTPTREF.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Time Point Name
datasetVariables.name: EXTPT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXTPTNUM

datasetVariables.description: Numerical version of EXTPT to aid in sorting.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXELTM

self.title: Planned Elapsed Time from Time Point Ref

datasetVariables.description: Planned elapsed time relative to the planned fixed reference (EXTPTREF). This variable is useful where there are repetitive measures. Not a clock time.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Elapsed Time from Time Point Ref
datasetVariables.name: EXELTM

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXTPTREF

datasetVariables.description: Name of the fixed reference point referred to by EXELTM, EXTPTNUM, and EXTPT. Examples: PREVIOUS DOSE, PREVIOUS MEAL.
datasetVariables.label: Time Point Reference
datasetVariables.name: EXTPTREF

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EX.EXRFTDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/time for a fixed reference time point defined by EXTPTREF.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Reference Time Point
datasetVariables.name: EXRFTDTC

description: An interventions domain that contains the details of a subject's exposure to protocol-specified study treatment. Study treatment may be any intervention that is prospectively defined as a test material within a study, and is typically but not always supplied to the subject. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C49587, 2018-06-29)
label: Exposure
name: EX
